issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description: Application working fine on other ios versions but ios 9.2.1 its crashing after splash screen.
fields.summary: Application crashing after splash screen on ios 9.2.1

comments.body:
Hello,

Thanks for sharing  with us. I have tested that issue you reported. I am not able to reproduce this issue. The app is loading as expected. 

*Environment*
{code}
Appcelerator CLI
  Installer                   = 4.2.3
  Core Package                = 5.2.0
Operating System
  Name                        = OSX El Capitan 
  Version                     = 10.11.3
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 4
  Memory                      = 8.0GB
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 0.12.7
  npm Version                 = 2.11.3
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.0.6
  node-appc Version           = 0.2.31
Java Development Kit
  Version                     = 1.7.0_25
Xcode: Version 7.2.1 
Titanium SDK:   5.2.0.GA
Platform:  iOS
iOS Simulator:  iPhone 6/ iOS 9.2
{code}

Please provide the log info that you see when the crash happens. Also, Run "appc info" in terminal and provide the log as a text file.

Thanks.


Thanks.
